rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports on birds killed using a neutral verb ('killed').
The segment describes a future action ('will be killed').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports culling and prevention effort but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation about risk, cases, or impact.
Describes a future action/response measure ('will be killed in order to prevent the virus from spreading') factually without active reassurance.
